product_name: Salomon EXO S-Lab Twinskin Shorts - Men's
long_description: Designed to help you run farther and recover quickly, the men's Salomon EXO S-Lab Twinskin Shorts combine internal compression shorts to promote muscle recovery with comfortable outer shorts. Internal shorts offer quick-drying, moisture-wicking support with light compression; compression shorts can help keep muscles warm and reduce strain. Outer shorts wick moisture and dry quickly, and their smooth construction reduces chafing during long runs. Reflective highlights; 3 gel pockets. The men's Salomon EXO S-Lab Twinskin Shorts feature have a next-to-skin fit.
short_description: Designed to help you run farther and recover quickly, the men's Salomon EXO S-Lab Twinskin Shorts combine internal compression shorts to promote muscle recovery with comfortable outer shorts.
